arts.ttl: Leeds United vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Leeds United welcome West Ham to Elland Road on Friday night, aiming to bounce back immediately after their long unbeaten home run was ended by Tottenham last time out. Before that defeat, the Whites had gone 23 league games without losing on their own patch, a run stretching back over a year. arts.ttl: Crysencio Summerville sends warning to Leeds United ahead of Elland Road reunion
arts.sum: Crysencio Summerville returns to Elland Road this Friday night as Leeds United welcome West Ham to West Yorkshire. Leeds need to get back to winning ways this weekend, after losing away to relegation rivals Burnley 2-0 last time out.
